General.Name: Alandsbanken Abp A
General.Description: Ålandsbanken Abp operates as a commercial bank in Finland and Sweden. Its deposit products include savings accounts, time deposits, covered bonds, and certificates of deposit. The company provides home loans, securities and other investment loans, loans for business operations, and loans for other household purposes to private individuals; loans to companies, public sector entities, and non-profit organizations; and credit and debit cards, as well as guarantees, overdrafts, and lines of credit. It also offers discretionary, advisory securities, and asset management products and services. In addition, the company supplies banking computer systems for small and medium-sized banks. Ålandsbanken Abp was founded in 1919 and is headquartered in Mariehamn, Finland.
